snippet: PEREIRA--Mortimer, of Manhattan, passed away on October 28, 2014 at age 96. Wonderful husband of Dorothy for over 50 years. Wonderful father to son Marshall and stepson Jeffrey Shaw and grandfather to three grandchildren and two great-grandchildre...
lead_paragraph: PEREIRA--Mortimer, of Manhattan, passed away on October 28, 2014 at age 96. Wonderful husband of Dorothy for over 50 years. Wonderful father to son Marshall and stepson Jeffrey Shaw and grandfather to three grandchildren and two great-grandchildren.
